cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.20ebb94b-8a55-4547-af0a-72b5c40deb1f.description=This flow with send an email notifying the Support team that the email notification to the creator failed. Input Values\: vm.requester.email - The email address from the prior step result htmldocument - THe email body text from the prior result cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.2ea8a573-1d22-4790-b41e-1ed051c85995.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.45acfe68-6860-4892-9ea5-5d012f8e7b76.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.7147fc82-d191-4b24-8a9d-2f74fc0138f8.description=This flow with send an email notifying the Support team that the email notification to the creator failed. Input Values\: vm.requester.email - The email address from the prior step result htmldocument - THe email body text from the prior result cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.846145ba-bc1e-4001-b92f-7c25f9607832.description=
Generate Run URL - Generates an href HTML link that contains a URL to the run history report for the current run.

Inputs\:
    variablename  - The name of the flow variable where the result should be stored.
Default value\: IC_ReportURL
    displaytext - The text to display for the href link. 
Default\: "Run History Report Available Here"

Results\:
    result - The untagged URL to the run report for the current run.
Example (with default values)\: IC_ReportURL ,Run History Report Available Here

Responses\:
    success - The flow completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The flow completed unsuccessfully.
cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.9405ea88-26a3-4c4a-bb4b-f43de200a28c.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.9ed0cfc3-104f-4b83-a474-854bd2d2c3cf.description=
This operation checks whether a string matches another string, using a specific matching rule. The "toMatch" input is the string that is checked for matching the "matchTo" expression. 

Inputs\:
    matchType - The type of match to perform.
Valid values\: Exact Match, Contains, Contains Once, Does Not Contain, Match All Words, Match No Words, Regex
Default value\: Exact Match
    toMatch - The string that is checked for matching.
    matchTo - The string to match against.
Example\: If "matchType" is “RegEx”, the "matchTo" input is a regular expression such as\: ^-?\d+(([\.,]\d+)?)+$. 
    ignoreCase - Specifies whether to ignore case when matching or not.
Valid values\: False, True
Default value\: False

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the string "Matches" if the "toMatch" string matches the "matchTo" string. Otherwise, it contains the string "Does Not Match".  

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.
cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.c8ef6f1f-97a0-468b-bfb5-1bc5b142f53c.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.description=Purpose\: Add two new heartbeat network interfaces to all servers in the physical cluster subscription. Prerequisites\: The cluster nodes are fully deployed with the MPC deployment steps on the CSA server component. MOE must be up and running. The server must be powered on. Implementation\: The main OO flow which is triggered by CSA uses a multi-instance panel to run a subflow on all CSA server components. In that way, the heartbeat NICs are added to all servers in parallel for efficiency (the subflow takes up to 20 minutes). In case of failure, an error variable is set and checked before completion of the main flow. In case of error of at least one cluster server, the subscription pauses on error. The subflow MOE_Add_HB_NICs starts by sleeping for a randomized duration between 1 and 180 seconds to have the flow executions slightly asynchronously. In case the operating system of the cluster node is Linux-based, the file 70-persistent-rules file is emptied by running the command > /etc/udev/rules.d/70-persistent-net.rules This is done because there are entries for interfaces that to not exist, making the interface number for the heart beat NICs unreliable. After emptying the file and rebooting, the content of the file is recreated and the heartbeat NICs have interface numbers eth4 and eth5. The main tasks of this subflow MOE_Add__HB_NICs are the following\: • Power off the server • Add Heart Beat NIC to server with subnet id p1-${vlanName} • Add Heart Beat NIC to server with subnet id p2-${vlanName} • Power on server The flow waits until successful completion of each task before proceeding to the next. Finally, an SA communication check is performed to check if the server is up and running. cab0c131-eb09-46f7-9423-1505d8fcc60f.f8f2bb14-8481-411b-be70-42432d3f5426.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: pc_add_HB_NICs

staticBinding.value: Failed to add Heartbeat NICs on at least one cluster node or server unresponsive
